description: Part single, part two storey side extension and ground floor rear extension
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension forming part of the proposal, by reason of its proximity to, height on the boundary and projection beyond the rear of the unattached neighbour at ground floor level, would be an intrusive and unneighbourly development that would have an adverse effect on the amenity of no. 282 Collier Row Lane through providing a wall of development, a sense of enclosure and having an overbearing impact on these adjacent occupiers, contrary to the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document and Local Plan Policy 7.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agent by e-mail.
